text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The cost of feeding Trump’s ego:
18,000 COVID-19 deaths and counting 
48,676 gun deaths and counting
16.8 million unemployed and counting 
$1.7 trillion budget deficit and counting
$24 trillion national debt and counting

Making America Go Away (MAGA)
